title: Yellow dot above loot
body: What is this yellow dot above the loot icon?

replies.body: It means you have new loot that is available for unlocking (or a reward you haven't yet seen).

> [{quoted}](name=Challenger Zoe,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=QxTfAsHq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-07T08:21:25.658+0000)
>
> It means you have new loot that is available for unlocking (or a reward you haven't yet seen).

But it doesn't go away...

This is apparently because the client is too stupid to realise you already got your freebies from the Preseason change over, and is thinking that you have logged in for the first time (i just got it, and it was telling me about my Blue Essence i got again)
